TopicTitle: Twitch Thursdays: Cleaning up the Sky

Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_nbejvnlmxn1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=Threading%2Bthe%2BNeedle&channel=dasvaldez&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&chapter_id=5043058"></object><br/>Our description of <a href="http://www.twitch.tv/dasvaldez/profile"><strong>DasValdez</strong></a>'s video will do it no justice, so here's the description straight from the page: <em>Build a broom, using no SAS, and fly it through a ring. That is falling. From the sky.</em> Think he’ll make it? Will the sky get extra clean? Watch and see.</p>
